Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at NH Gran Hotel Casino Extremadura in Badajoz, you'll be convenient to Puente de Palmas and La Giralda. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Puerto de Palmas and Museo de Bellas Artes.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 58 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have jetted bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages. Gambling sorts can try their luck at the casino, while others may prefer a health club or a sauna. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Badajoz? This hotel has facilities measuring 10373 square feet (964 square meters), including conference space. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Puente de Palmas - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Puerto de Palmas - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Museo de Bellas Artes - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
La Giralda - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Plaza de San Francisco - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Alcazaba - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Plaza de Espana - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Badajoz Cathedral - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Plaza Alta - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Elvas Castle - 15.6 km / 9.7 mi
Praca da Republica - 15.7 km / 9.7 mi
Cesar Correia Stadium - 15.9 km / 9.9 mi
Republic Square - 16.1 km / 10 mi
Campo Maior Castle - 16.1 km / 10 mi
Campo Maior Church - 16.1 km / 10 mi

The preferred airport for NH Gran Hotel Casino Extremadura is Badajoz (BJZ-Talavera La Real) - 14.2 km / 8.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
